{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = HummingBoard-enclosure-705x584.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = HummingBoard Edge Quad 1GHz i.MX6 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.solid-run.com/nxp-family/hummingboard/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SolidRun |model = HummingBoard Edge |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Quad |revision = REV 1.4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6Q; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1chipmodelfull = 4 |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, NGFF M.2, Mini PCIe, Micro SD Card slot, SIM Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 7-36 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J25 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, LVDS, GPIO, RTC w/ battery, IR receiver, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), SIM Card slot |addchip = I2C RTC;NXP;PCF8523;;1;,,, Dual Non-inverting Buffer;ON Semi;NLX2G16;;1;,,, 12-bit 4-channel ADC w/I2C Interface;TI;ADS7924;;1;,,, 2-Channel SPDT Bidirectional Analog Switch;TI;TS3A5223;;1;,,, 3A 36V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT2875B;;2;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Hub Controller;Microchip;USB2514Bi;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode for High Speed Data Line;ON Semi;ESD7004;;3;,,, .5A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2156;;2;,,, 250mA CMOS Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;Taiwan Semiconductor;TS9011;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Armbian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2017 |estprice = 180 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Israel
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX6Q ''Quad'' :@1GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A9) *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC2000 / GC320 :Video decoding 1080p60 H.264 *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8GB eMMC 5.1 HS400, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: MIPI DSI, LVDS and HDMI *Audio Output: Analog via 3.5mm *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 *PCIe: 1x M.2 for SSD (2242, Key B), :1x Mini PCIe w/ SIM support *GPIO: 1x 24-pin header, 1x 12-pin header *Power Source: 7-36V barrel, recommended 12V/2A
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:HummingBoard-enclosure-705x584.png| File:HummingBoard-edge-180x180.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::internal| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:SolidRun HummingBoard Edge Quad Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SolidRun HummingBoard Edge Quad Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
